timeline.bodyText: i think this should be part of storage_formats group (no need for new group), especially if it exploits new way of interacting between presto, file format, and file system.
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
i think this should be part of storage_formats group (no need for new group),

Avro tests are still part of storage_formats. This group allows to exclude avro tests until #3794 is fixed (there is also TODO in bin/product-tests-suite-5.sh)
replies.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText:
Some are. But some are not (presto-product-tests/src/main/java/io/prestosql/tests/hive/TestAvroSchemaUrl.java, presto-product-tests/src/main/java/io/prestosql/tests/hive/TestAvroSchemaEvolution.java)
maybe those two shouldnt' be storage_formats though
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: oh, the TestAvroSchemaUrl should be. Please add
replies.author: findepi
